Summary: Two white orbes and one cigar shaped
trends: There have been no other sightings in Dania Beach
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsme and my friend *(name deleted--cms\sg) pull in to john u loyd park in danya beach to park and make out. once we stoped i put in a nine inch nails tape, the song bow down before the one you serve started to play. i looked out to my right window gazing at the ocean, when i looked up i saw what i thought was a airplain coming for a landin. i noticed it was not because it had no landind gear lights. and when it got close to shore the light from the orb reflected off the ocean. just then i heard nothing, no ocean waves, i can see them but not hear them and the music stopped and the frogs in the canal stopped cricking. it passed slowly behing the trees elumaiteing everything. then it eventually over the canal till couldn't see anymore. everything came back to normal and me and my friend question our selfs. and when i looked over to my right there was two more. me and him started to freak out. thetwo objects reach the shore line, one an orbe the other a cigar shape. the same thing happen" all aspect of reality stopped. i wanted to get out of the car but *(same name deleted--cms\sg) wouldn't let me go. i kicked and kicked the stering wheel and him all the while hanging out the window. i was staring at the last cigar shaped orbed and can see into the window and seeing the beings. they were all looking at me. it was terrifing but i wanted to get out of the car and go back and see more. finally the ocean waves came back,the frogs came back and the music came back on, *(same name deleted--cms\sg)was comatosed, the sun was coming up and the song was still playing the same song only a couple of minutes in. i dont know what happend but my friend *(same name deleted--cms\sg) never wants to talk about it. but i always do!
